It's a rare moment when William takes his pencil drawings digital. He has been focused on working from photo and imagination. That's something that needs to change - a balanced approach. On Tuesday he imported two photos of pencil sketches that he had drawn during his time in Wellington. This is the result.

The line layer. He believes the pencil line looks more professional and there is more control. But he's use to producing the digital line. It may serve some use in the future.

The tone layer. As usual William has used a range of brushes in order to show texture and variety in the work.
